Uses of Class
playingCards.Card

Packages that use Card
Package
Description
playingCards
Defines a playing card object, as well as two different hand containers: a hand of cards a player would hold, and a deck of cards that would be used to deal cards from.
videoPoker
 
videoPoker.pokerHands
